author: J__B_
title: Great pieces
review:
The two front wheels are made of rubber. Although they probably are, I haven't seen them in other sets.

The clear/yellow piston is great for this set! You usually only see them in larger sets, so it's a nice addition.

The designs on the red pieces are stickers---some people like em, some don't.

The best part of the set: Definately the piston/engine.

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Technic - Road Rebel Review
review:
This set looks very cool but it almost doesn't have any play features. The only play feature you get is that you get a clear engine piece which has a yellow piston in it which moves up and down if you maneuver this car. There're also a few stickers included in this set which you need to put on. I like the way how LEGO used the pieces from the palm trees to make the black engines. This vehicle looks very fast and it's an easy set to build. This model is fun to play with as well. I think this set is a great set to start building LEGO Technic models and it's also a great set for pieces which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations) and brickfilms.

All in all this set is an good set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de
